epiplots 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Static Choropleth

    plot_map.Rd

    Static choropleth map of France.

    Usage

    plot_map(
  df,
  x,
  x_range = NULL,
  date = NULL,
  map = NULL,
  factor_palette = NULL,
  color_palette = NULL,
  n_breaks = 5,
  na_color = "grey",
  border_color = "white",
  border_size = 0,
  percent = FALSE,
  si_notation = TRUE,
  keywidth = 70,
  label = FALSE,
  label_column = "label",
  label_size = 3,
  title = NULL,
  subtitle = NULL,
  caption = NULL,
  legend_title = NULL
)

    Arguments

    df

    dataframe / tibble / datatable Dataset.

    x

    chr Column name of variable to be plotted in the choropleth.

    x_range

    vector Min and max value to be used when setting the color scale of x. If NULL, the min and max observed in x will be used. Default is NULL.

    date

    date Date to be plotted. If NULL, the most recent available date is used. Default is NULL.

    map

    sf An optional simple features dataset containing GIS data to join with df if not using one of the default maps. Default is NULL.

    factor_palette

    vector Named list of colors (values) and label names (keys) to use for the color scale. This option is intended for categorical variables and if present plot_map() will ignore n_breaks and color_palette.

    color_palette

    palette Color palette to be used. If none is provided, a reversed version of 'YlOrRd' from RColorBrewer::brewer.pal() will be used.

    n_breaks

    int Number of desired breaks in x; to be passed to base::pretty(). Default is 5.

    na_color

    chr Color to use for shapes with no data. Default is grey.

    border_color

    chr Color of the borders. Default is white.

    border_size

    int Size of the borders. Default is 0 (no borders).

    percent

    bool Whether to format the the legend labels as percents. Default is FALSE.

    si_notation

    bool Whether to format the legend labels with a limited si notation (k for thousands, M for millions). Default is FALSE.

    keywidth

    int Width of legend color bar. Note this is the length of the whole bar, not a single segment. Default is 70.

    label

    bool If TRUE, id labels will appear on the map. Default is FALSE.

    label_column

    chr String indicating the column name to be used for labeling if label is TRUE. Default is 'label'.

    label_size

    int Text size of labels; ignored if label is FALSE. Default is 3.

    title

    chr Title.

    subtitle

    chr Subtitle.

    caption

    chr Caption.

    legend_title

    chr Legend Title.

    Value

    ggplot map.

    On this page
